means: （常指因病而）憔悴的，疲惫不堪

sentence.Network_en: A few are dim-witted drones, but most are talented, frustrated, wasted people.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几个是愚笨的寄生虫，但是大多数是有才能却不得志而自暴自弃的人。

sentence.Network_en: His manual dexterity and fine spatial skills were wasted on routine tasks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他灵巧的动手能力和杰出的空间识别能力都浪费在日常事务上了。

sentence.Network_en: Tom wasted no time in telling me why he had come.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆马上告诉了我他来的原因。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 正式场合_fang_新浪博客 ... 118. busted: 做坏事被抓到 120. wasted: 喝得大醉 123. peanuts 数量很小，价值很低.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(W1) ... wasted power 损失功率 wasted 浪费的消耗的 waster 废纱头.
the fields were wasted by a long drought ., 那些田地由于久旱而荒废了.
新概念英语第二册 29、30课答案_百度知道 ... c. abandoned( 被抛弃的)， d. wasted( 浪费的)这3个都与 c. round( 环绕，绕过)与.

list.abs: 人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... give up 放弃 waste 浪费 not...any more 不再.
大学英语四级考试大纲(W)|英语四级词汇 ... warmth n. 暖和，温暖；热烈 waste n. 浪费；废物；垃圾 watch vt.&vi. 观看 n.手表.
外研版英语九年级上册单词_百度文库 ... cafe n. 咖啡厅 wasteful a. 浪费的 metal n. 金属.

entry.def: A wasted action is one that is unnecessary.

example.ex: I'm sorry you had a wasted journey.
example.tran: 非常抱歉让你白跑了一趟。

entry.tran: (常指因病而)憔悴的，疲惫不堪的
entry.def: Someone who is wasted is very tired and weak, often because of an illness.

example.ex: They look too wasted to care about much.
example.tran: 他们看上去疲惫不堪,以至于顾不上太多。

means.word_mean: 1. serving no useful purpose; having no excuse for being;
3. (of an organ or body part) diminished in size or strength as a result of disease or injury or lack of use;

sentences.sentence: "partial paralysis resulted in an atrophied left arm"

means.word_mean: 4. very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold;

sentences.sentence: "a nightmare population of gaunt men and skeletal boys"
"kept life in his wasted frame only by grim concentration"

auth_sentence.content: Music shouldn't be wasted on such empty gestures.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music shouldn't be wasted on such empty gestures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music shouldn't be wasted on such empty gestures.

auth_sentence.content: I certainly don't want my tax dollars wasted.
auth_sentence.res_content: I certainly don't want my tax dollars wasted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I certainly don't want my tax dollars wasted.

auth_sentence.content: It is perfectly good fuel that is being wasted.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is perfectly good fuel that is being wasted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is perfectly good fuel that is being wasted.

Sentence.sentence: They may regret the time they wasted.
However, characteristics associated with modern consumer culture mean produce is often wasted through retail and customer behaviour.
